gameframework.particles

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframework.particles.Particle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticleMock

    public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores every useful information about a single particle like its position on the screen, its color... This class is used internally by "ParticleGroup" There's no reason to instantiate it directly

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        the id of the particle. This id is relative to the group that the particle is part of. A group is formed when ParticleEmitter.emit(Color, Rectangle, int, ParticleBehavior) is called An id of 0 means that this particle is the first of the group
